meta.review_content: So I get my statement yesterday 9th March and WOW.... You will never guess what... I AM STILL BEING BILLED for PM CONNECT... TO WHICH I NEVER SUBSCRIBED..... Vodacom sorted out the problem for December January..... but STILL I am being billed for 1 Feb to 28 Feb..... WOW. What can I do..... You cannot speak to a human and their BOT service well. whoever put that together..... nuf said...... then the BOT says I am learning...... I don't think so..........
